patthana12.9:1.1_0: Noāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanoāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana12.9:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:2.1_0: Nasāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana12.9:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:3.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naāsavavippayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana12.9:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:4.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana12.9:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:5.1_0: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.9:6.1_0: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana12.9:6.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
